pyopensky
=========

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

Source code on `github <https://github.com/open-aviation/pyopensky>`_

The pyopensky library provides function to easily download data from
`The OpenSky Network <https://opensky-network.org/>`_ databases. This minimal 
library is ideal for quickly downloading and locally saving data that you will
use in your future studies. All functions return pandas :class:`~pandas.DataFrame`.

.. hint::

   If Python is your language of choice in general, and you are interested in
   analysing aircraft trajectories, please refer to the following `section in
   the traffic <https://traffic-viz.github.io/data_sources/opensky_db.html>`_
   library. traffic wraps the same pyopensky queries and returns
   :class:`~traffic.core.Traffic` and :class:`~traffic.core.Flight` objects.
